Package Model

Class Appointment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Appointment
  • public class Appointment
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains methods for creating appointment objects, which contain information as present in the appointments database.

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • Appointment

        public Appointment​(int ID,
                   java.lang.String title,
                   java.lang.String description,
                   java.lang.String location,
                   java.lang.String type,
                   java.time.LocalDateTime startTime,
                   java.time.LocalDateTime endTime,
                   java.lang.String createdBy,
                   java.lang.String lastUpdatedBy,
                   int customerID,
                   int userID,
                   int contactID,
                   java.lang.String contactName)
        Standard appointment constructor.
        Parameters:
        ID - the ID of the appointment.
        title - the title of the appointment.
        description - a description of the appointment.
        location - the location of the appointment (e.g. New York).
        type - the type of appointment (e.g. consultation).
        startTime - the start time of the appointment.
        endTime - the end time of the appointment.
        createdBy - the name of the user that created the appointment.
        lastUpdatedBy - the name of the user that last updated the appointment.
        customerID - the ID of the customer the appointment is assigned to.
        userID - the ID of the user that created the appointment.
        contactID - the ID of the contact the appointment is assigned to.
        contactName - the name of the contact the appointment is assigned to.
